programme.title: Murder Without Motive: True Crime Presents
programme.desc: Documentary. Tony Blockley and his team find a perplexing murder scene and launch an inquest.

programme.title: Sara Davies Christmas Craft Off
programme.desc: Dani Dyer and Charlotte Crosby join Sara Davies for festive fun creating macrame magic, centrepiece perfection, and a very personal gift with wool, glue and joy.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Chasing the jackpot this time are brothers Laurence and Ben from Hampshire, friends Karen and Helene from Scotland, and workmates Oliver and Franklyn from Huddersfield.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Its Craigs turn to take on the Banker as Stephen Mulhern hosts the iconic game show with only one question.

programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Craig from Cheshire, Louisa from Huntingdon, Harry from York and Anna from Oxford work together as a team to face one of the countrys finest quiz brains.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Lydia reevaluates her loyalty to Kim, Kerrys joy is short-lived, and Vinny is disgruntled.

programme.title: The Martin Lewis Money Show Live
programme.desc: As the year draws to a close, join Martin for the final show of 2025 - hell unpack the latest financial headlines in his Big Briefing and what that means for our money.

programme.title: The 1% Club Rollover
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts a spin-off of the quiz where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes as 100 contestants try to win a prize pot of anything up to 500,000 pounds.
